title: Stage Lv6-D3-S09
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Innovative technology has been developed. (professional variant 1)
Prototype development has been completed. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Innovative technology has been developed. (professional variant 1)
Prototype development has been completed. (professional variant 1)
Patent application is in progress. (professional variant 1)
The proof of concept was successful. (professional variant 1)
Commercialization potential is high. (professional variant 1)
There is potential for disruptive innovation. (professional variant 1)
Technology transfer negotiations are underway. (professional variant 1)
R&D investment has increased. (professional variant 1)
Intellectual property rights are protected. (professional variant 1)
The minimum viable product has been launched. (professional variant 1)
